name: AVAudio3DMixingRenderingAlgorithm
desc: The types of rendering algorithms available per input bus of the environment node.

items.name: case auto
items.desc: Automatically selects the highest-quality rendering algorithm available for the current playback hardware.

items.name: case equalPowerPanning
items.desc: An algorithm that pans the data of the mixer bus into a stereo field.

items.name: case HRTF
items.desc: A high-quality algorithm that uses filtering to emulate 3D space in headphones.

items.name: case HRTFHQ
items.desc: A higher-quality head-related transfer function rendering algorithm.

items.name: case soundField
items.desc: An algorithm that renders to multichannel hardware.

items.name: case sphericalHead
items.desc: An algorithm that emulates 3D space in headphones by simulating interaural time delays and other spatial cues.

items.name: case stereoPassThrough
items.desc: An algorithm to use when the source data doesnâ€™t need localization.
